about.title: About Me

description.paragraph1: Hi, I'm Galuh Satria, a {age}-year-old web development enthusiast. I started learning web development in December 2021 through YouTube, focusing primarily on frontend development.
description.paragraph2: Currently, I am studying computer science at a university in Lombok, Nusa Tenggara Barat, and I am actively involved in several campus communities, including the Google Developer Student Club.
description.paragraph3: I enjoy learning new things and appreciate feedback to help me improve.
